short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The new version of MoocNote allows users to take synchronized notes with screenshots directly on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take notes that link back to the appropriate place in the videos. Extra features like screen capture, drawing on the video, copy text from the video. Check your notes anytime, anywhere. All notes are organized in one single place. Simple way to add videos to playlists.
